item.title: Introduction to Pycon Pakistan 2019
item.description:
Description

We kicked off the Python track at Pycon Pakistan 2019. Mashhood Rastgar the lead organiser shared about the communities, organisers, partners and rules of the conference.
item.dc:creator: Mashhood Rastgar

item.title: Rapid prototyping scalable Python services using AWS Chalice
item.description:
Description

Looking to deploy Python code on AWS Lambda? Getting started with serverless can be a bit daunting at times with creating the functions, configuring them, configuring api gateways and what not. In this talk you will learn about the magic of rapid serverless api development using AWS Chalice.
item.dc:creator: Mashhood Rastgar
